One Century Tower is a 19-story,  tall building located in New Haven, Connecticut. When it was built in 1990, it was the third-tallest building in the city. As of September 2025, it is the fourth-tallest building in the city. The building also features an eight-story parking garage.
The building was designed by New Haven architectural firm Cesar Pelli & Associates, who designed multiple other buildings including the Petronas Twin Towers in Kuala Lumpur, World Financial Center in New York City, and the Salesforce Tower in San Francisco.
